title: Drawing, "Design for a Coffeepot", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower left: cafetiere (underlined); at lower right: acier inoxydable [stainless steel]
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Flaring cylindrical coffeepot drawn in plan and elevation decorated around the lower center with two applied bands, the rounded lid with applied curved thumbpiece and a scroll handle.
Puiforcat fabrication #: 9164, Pot avec 2 bates au corps (in silver); later this design is worked up as tea service: # 9256, Service the moderne erase 2 bates en relief au corps, also Cafetiere, Theiere, Sucrier, Cremier
